name: browser-profile-switcher
title: Chrome Profile Switcher
description: Quickly cycle between Chrome browser profiles with a keyboard shortcut
author: sajad

commands.name: switch-to
commands.title: Switch Chrome Profile
commands.description: Cycle between your Chrome browser profiles

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
